data.title: SpyMaster Interview #29 - Maryam d’Abo
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from SpyHards - A Spy Movie Podcast on Spotify.  Agents Scott and Cam welcome actress Maryam d'Abo to the show to discuss her breakthrough performance as Kara Milovy in the 1987 Timothy Dalton 007 adventure The Living Daylights. She also shares intel on her experience co-writing, producing and hosting the 2002 documentary Bond Girls Are Forever. Become a SpyHards Patron and gain access to top secret "Agents in the Field" bonus episodes, movie commentaries and more! Pick up exclusive SpyHards merch, including the new "What Does Vargas Do?" t-shirt by @shaylayy, available only at Redbubble Social media: @spyhards View the NOC List and the Disavowed List at Letterboxd.com/spyhards Podcast artwork by Hannah Hughes. Theme music by Doug Astley.
